summary: I’m curious how that could be because I thought they were all one piece flight suits.  I actually have an X-Wing costume with a...
caption: I’m curious how that could be because I thought they were all one piece flight suits.  I actually have an X-Wing costume with a one piece flight suit, so I’m not sure how shorts would work there.

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: Between Death and Winter
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RbRYHY

by crossingwinter

“I’ll answer none of your questions, crow,” she snapped.

Ben placed the butt of the spear down in the snow and leaned on it as he sheathed his sword. He was breathing more heavily than he wanted to admit as he looked down at her.

You should kill her, then, he thought in a voice that sounded very much like the Lord Commander’s. If she’d rather die, then let her die.

Except there was something wrong in that. He didn’t know why, but it felt wrong.

“Pity for you,” he said and he broke the spear over his knee. “I’ll be taking you with me back to Castle Black.”

The moment the words were out of his lips, he regretted them. He was the First Ranger, he was in the middle of a ranging—he didn’t have time to keep a spearwife hostage.

Words: 22485, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey (Star Wars), Snoke (Star Wars), Finn (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Amilyn Holdo, Luke Skywalker
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - A Song of Ice and Fire Fusion, that I wrote a fic in which they weren’t immediately married to one another is an accomplishment


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RbRYHY

blog.name: nostalgiachan
blog.title: Nost's Boxed Whine
blog.description: I'm Kaitlin: artist, voice actress, creator of shows about bad fanfiction. If you just want to see my art, I usually tag reblogs and non-art with "Not Art" or "Not My Art."

summary: As mentioned, our RP has a secondary villain now: Voluele Lucul, a Zeltron Inquisitor, “mentor” of Talon, and a neon nightmare...
caption: As mentioned, our RP has a secondary villain now: Voluele Lucul, a Zeltron Inquisitor, “mentor” of Talon, and a neon nightmare if there ever was one. I wanted to make a character who went against pretty much every standard of a Sith villain; she almost never stops smiling, loves bright colors, and is all-around cheerful and charming. Of course, none of that stops her from being incredibly violent, having a soft spot for torture, and being an absolutely devoted servant of the Empire. She also uses lightsaber tonfas because I am a loser for some of the non-standard lightsabers out there. Now if only her idiot apprentice didn’t keep making her job that much harder…

reblog.comment: As mentioned, our RP has a secondary villain now: Voluele Lucul, a Zeltron Inquisitor, “mentor” of Talon, and a neon nightmare if there ever was one. I wanted to make a character who went against pretty much every standard of a Sith villain; she almost never stops smiling, loves bright colors, and is all-around cheerful and charming. Of course, none of that stops her from being incredibly violent, having a soft spot for torture, and being an absolutely devoted servant of the Empire. She also uses lightsaber tonfas because I am a loser for some of the non-standard lightsabers out there. Now if only her idiot apprentice didn’t keep making her job that much harder…

Of course, none of that stops her from being incredibly violent, having a soft spot for torture, and being an absolutely devoted servant of the Empire. She also uses lightsaber tonfas because I am a loser for some of the non-standard lightsabers out there. Now if only her idiot apprentice didn’t keep making her job that much harder…

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: A Matter of Time
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TzTLmV

by ReyNimanSolo

When a Rebel mission goes wrong, Rey must decide how far she’s willing to go to save her friends from the violent wrath of Supreme Leader Armitage Hux.

~*~

“What do you want?” she grits out.

Hux tsks. “More useless games, Jedi.” He drags slim, pale fingers along the arms of his throne, drawing his elbows in as he sits back. His green eyes bore into hers with malicious delight.

“You know what I want,” he says.

The words send cold panic down her back. Because she knows exactly what he wants. He made it clear as kyber yesterday. She had laughed in his face and flatly refused. Then the torture had started.

Words: 2972, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Armitage Hux, Finn (Star Wars), Poe Dameron
  • Relationships: reyux - Relationship
  • Additional Tags: Extremely Dubious Consent, Reyux, Supreme Leader Armitage Hux, Jedi Rey, Hux is Not Nice, Implied/Referenced Torture, poor Finn, Poor Poe, Rey’s Got It Bad Too, Only Hux Is Having Fun, Eventual Smut, Tags will be updated as needed


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TzTLmV

title: The Empress and her Knight
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GYeW0f

by Carefulthatsenough

This is how Empress Hux and Knight Ren came together to rule their empire

summary: I decided create new art and since I've already done a couple of arts with different characters, so i decided to come back to...
caption:
I decided create new art and since I’ve already done a couple of arts with different characters, so i decided to come back to Ahsoka :3 I hoped you will appreciate the work.

Решил сделать новый арт и раз уж сделал пару артов с разными персонажами, так решил обратно вернутся к Асоке :3 надеюсь вы оцените работу.

blog.name: unafearlessme
blog.title: Una Fearless
blog.description: Hobby writer with heart & soul - Star Wars Fanfiction

summary:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
body:
Show Chapter | Archive of Our Own

Love on the Dark Side

Story update ch. 3 - Disturbances

Excerpt:

Finally Hux had some spare time and he knew exactly how to spend it: In his tub, taking a hot and relaxing bath, thereupon he would cuddle up in his bed and take some well deserved rest. He smiled in anticipation, quickly gave over his command and hurried to his rooms at the ships officer’s quarters.

When he arrived there he took off his coat, then noticed the green blinking light of his datapad. Annoyed he let out a breath, went over to his desk and picked it up. It was a message from Kylo Ren:

I want to meet you in private. Notify me as soon as you get this message. K.R.

So, that was it with a few relaxed hours before meeting the Government of Soliss Prim. Kylo Ren already took the last of his nerves.
